graphs.query: i.scheme='edr' | group endpoints = estimate_distinct(agent.uuid) | columns endpoints
graphs.title: Total Endpoints

graphs.query: i.scheme='edr' NOT(endpoint.name contains ('aks-agentpool','pool','k8s')) | group event_count = count() by endpoint.name | sort -event_count | limit 10
graphs.title: Top Endpoints by Event Volume

graphs.query: i.scheme='edr' NOT(meta.event.name contains ('BEHAVIORALINDICATORS','DUPLICATEPROCESS','TCPV4','DNS','PROCESSEXIT','WINLOGOFF','GROUPCREATION','REGVALUEDELETE','HTTP','MODULELOAD')) | group event_count = count() by meta.event.name | sort -event_count | limit 10
graphs.title: Top Event Types
